answers.answer: It sounds like you may have a UTI which is a urinary tract infection. i have experienced that. that is definetly something you should go to the doctor and get checked out, because it could be something more serious
Looks like you have a urinary tract infection should go see your doctor.
yes, go see your doctor.  The beginning of Diabetes type 2 also makes you pee a lot.

question: I always feel like I have to pee.  I can go to the restroom and pee,but as soon as I walk out I feel like I still have to pee! I will sit on the toilet and seems like I am about to urinate all over myself,but I have to force out the 3 or 4 drops that feel so heavy in my bladder.  This is a daily struggle fr me. Iam a female.
title: Why do I always have to pee?
